mapper.insert: insert into T_DECORATION_MATERIAL (DECORATION_MATERIAL_ID, DECORATION_APPLY_ID, MATERIAL_NAME, MATERIAL_ADDRESS) values (#{decorationMaterialId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{decorationApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{materialName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{materialAddress,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.select: select DECORATION_MATERIAL_ID, DECORATION_APPLY_ID, MATERIAL_NAME, MATERIAL_ADDRESS from T_DECORATION_MATERIAL
